key_principles: Fusion over Imitation: Mix habit tracking precision with nature's organic flow.
Emotion First: Every interaction should feel like a deep breath.
Negative Space: Use whitespace as a luxury element.
Soft Geometry: No sharp edges; everything is rounded and approachable.

visual_enhancers.textures: Subtle grain overlay (opacity 0.03) on backgrounds to reduce digital flatness.

layout_strategy.mobile_first: Stack vertically on mobile, expand to grid on desktop. Touch targets min 44px.

buttons.primary: bg-primary text-primary-foreground rounded-full px-8 py-3 shadow-soft hover:shadow-hover transition-all duration-300 hover:-translate-y-0.5
buttons.secondary: bg-secondary text-secondary-foreground rounded-full px-6 py-2 hover:bg-secondary/80 transition-colors
buttons.ghost: hover:bg-muted text-muted-foreground hover:text-foreground rounded-lg px-4 py-2

cards.habit: bg-card border border-border/50 rounded-2xl p-6 shadow-sm hover:shadow-md transition-all duration-300 group relative overflow-hidden
cards.focus: bg-card rounded-3xl overflow-hidden shadow-float aspect-[4/5] relative group cursor-pointer

inputs.default: bg-white border-border rounded-xl px-4 py-3 focus:ring-2 focus:ring-primary/20 focus:border-primary transition-all

navigation.mobile: fixed bottom-6 left-4 right-4 bg-white/90 backdrop-blur-xl border border-white/20 shadow-float rounded-full p-2 flex justify-around items-center z-50
navigation.desktop: sticky top-0 z-40 bg-background/80 backdrop-blur-md border-b border-border/50

instructions_to_main_agent: CRITICAL: Do not use standard 'SaaS Blue'. Use the specified 'Sage' and 'Morning Mist' palette.
Use 'Playfair Display' for all H1-H3 headings to give it a premium, editorial feel.
Implement the 'Voice Command Center' as a floating action button (FAB) that pulses gently.
For the 'Focus Practices', use the provided flower/nature images as full-screen backgrounds with a glassmorphism overlay for controls.
Ensure the 'Habit Tracker' uses soft, rounded checkboxes. When checked, trigger a subtle 'gold' glow animation.
The 'AI Coach' chat interface should look like a clean messaging app (e.g., iMessage) but with the app's soft color palette.
Ensure all interactive elements have 'data-testid' attributes.
Mobile responsiveness is paramount. Test the 'Voice' button placement on mobile screens.
universal_guidelines: Avoid generic centered layouts. Use asymmetry where possible.
Create depth through layered design elements with z-index hierarchy.
Use glass-morphism effects with backdrop filters (12-24px blur).
Do not apply universal transitions (transition: all).
Never use AI assistant emojis for icons.
